TopicTitle: How to make EVE atmospheres and oceans in Kopernicus?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

 

Can someone please help me make eve/scaterer compatible atmospheres for my planets? Also, how do I make oceans?

Quote

About my new mod, it is a planet between Duna and Kerbin called Orcus, and its five moons, (Vesta, Vanth, Charkliko, Sendan and Keris), and their three submoons (Apohis (Vanth), Haley (Sendan) and Dren (Charkliko)),

Thanks in advance
